cons: Most attacks are short-ranged, except for Royal Guard which has a gigantic hitbox
Royal Guard may be difficult to get a hang of

info: To create one, choose the 'Mihile' option in the Character Creation screen. Mihile's have their own separate creation button. As well, they have a different story than regular Cygnus Knights but are part of the same class group

build: -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> ->

details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
To obtain Call of Cygnus, you need to complete a series of quests in 4th Job

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Radiant Cross - Reinforce, Spread and Extra Strike
  • Four-Point Assault - Reinforce and Extra Strike

primary.name: Imperial Recall
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, return to Ereve immediately.\nCooldown: 600 sec.

primary.name: Knight's Watch
primary.shortDesc: Barrier Duration: 45 sec, Enemy Blows Blocked: 9, Damage: +25%. Damage -30% only for attacks that inflict damage at a certain ratio of the Max HP. [Cooldown: 180 sec]
primary.desc: Creates a barrier that blocks a fixed number of attacks and also increases %Damage while active
details: For %Max HP attacks, reduces the amount of damage taken

Can be found in the Link Manager
  • Skill is only applicable to Mihile, when linked, characters receive a %Knockback Resistance buff instead

primary.name: Royal Guard
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 20, become invincible when attacked for 4 sec, nullifying attacks and counterattacking for a set time after use. Attack Power increases for 12 sec per counterattack.
If you guard successfully while in Attack Power Increase buff state, counterattack damage, attack range, and Attack Power increases gradually, but the time for guarding decreases gradually.
[1st Time]: Max Number of Enemies: 6, Damage: 275% + 1% per level, Number of Attacks: 4, Attack Power: +10.
[2nd Time]: Max Number of Enemies: 7, Damage: 340% + 1% per level, Number of Attacks: 5, Attack Power: +15.
[3rd Time]: Max Number of Enemies: 8, Damage: 440% + 1% per level, Number of Attacks: 6, Attack Power: +20.
Cooldown: 6 sec
primary.desc: Briefly becomes invincible while parrying the next attack for a set time after use
details: Counterattack will create a damaging shockwave that becomes bigger for each successful counterattack (up to 3 stacks)
Successful counterattacks will also grant an Attack buff that grows stronger for each successful counterattack (up to 3 stacks)

primary.name: Soul Blade
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Damage: 340%, Max Enemies Hit: 5
primary.desc: Swings your sword creating a blade projectile that travels forward

primary.name: Weightless Heart
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, allows you to jump a greater distance
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Soul Devotion
primary.shortDesc: Movement Speed +25, Jump +20

primary.name: HP Boost
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +20%

primary.name: Sword Mastery
primary.shortDesc: One-Handed Sword Mastery: +50%, Final Damage: +15%

primary.name: Final Attack
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skills] Has a 40% chance to deal 50% Final Attack damage 3 time(s).
primary.desc: Grants your attacks a chance to deal an additional hit

primary.name: Sword Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Weapon's Attack Speed increased for 180 sec

primary.name: Rally
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Attack Power: +30, Duration: 180 sec\n[Passive Effects: Attack Power +20]

primary.name: Soul Driver
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 18, Damage: 145%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Creates multiple swords that rain down on nearby enemies

primary.name: Radiant Driver
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Damage: 400%, Max Enemies Pushed: 6
primary.desc: Dashes forward while pushing enemies back

primary.name: Vertical Radiant Driver
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Damage: 400%, Max Enemies Pushed: 6
primary.desc: Charges upwards while pushing enemies back
details: Can also be activated by pressing the Up Arrow Key and Skill Key together
Shares Skill Points (SP) with

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Self Recovery
primary.shortDesc: Regularly recovers 300 HP and 90 MP.

primary.name: Intense Focus
primary.shortDesc: Strength: +60, Critical Rate: +20%, Final Damage: +10%, Attack Speed: +1

primary.name: Righteous Indignation
primary.shortDesc: When attacking enemies in Stun, Blind, Freeze, Incapacitation, or Charging Light Debuff status, Final Damage: +25%, Critical Rate: +20%

primary.name: Advanced Royal Guard
primary.shortDesc: [4th Time]: Max Number of Enemies: 10, Damage: 480% + 1% per level, Number of Attacks: 7, Attack Power: +30.\n[5th Time]: Max Number of Enemies: 15, Damage: 565% + 1% per level, Number of Attacks: 9, Attack Power: +45.
details: Increases max stacks to 5

primary.name: Enduring Spirit
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, DEF: +100%, Abnormal Status Resistance: +60, Elemental Resistance: +60%, Duration: 180 sec

primary.name: Soul Link
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per sec: 15\n[Mihile]: Damage: +5% per party member, recover 1% of Max HP per 4 sec. Receive 20% of party member's damage that can be nullified with Royal Guard. If you are not in a party, you will be considered to be in your own party.\n[Party Member]: Share Attack Power: Attack Power and Magic ATT +50% when Mihile succeeds with Royal Guard, and Abnormal Status: +20% and DEF: +30% from Enduring Spirit.
primary.desc: While active, you gain increased %Damage for every party member and you periodically restore some %Max HP
details:
Additionally, a portion of the damage your party takes is redirected to you
  • Damage can be nullified with
[Party Members]: Gain a portion of Attack and Magic Attack provided from when Mihile succeeds with and a portion of Abnormal Status Resistance and %DEF provided from

primary.name: Magic Crash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, 100% chance to remove enemies' buffs. For 22 sec, prevents 10 enemies from casting buffs.\nCooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Removes buffs on nearby enemies and prevents them from casting new buffs

primary.name: Trinity Attack
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 19, Damage: 410%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Slashes forward three times dealing damage to multiple enemies in front of you

primary.name: Radiant Charge
primary.shortDesc: Damage: +60%

primary.name: Soul Asylum
primary.shortDesc: When Royal Guard is successful, Damage -5% only for attacks that inflict damage at a certain ratio to max HP for 15 sec\nDamage -20% permanently.
primary.desc: When is successful, you gain a %Damage Reduction buff against %Max HP attacks
details: Additionally, permanently increases %Damage Reduction

primary.name: Expert Sword Mastery
primary.shortDesc: One-Handed Sword Mastery: +70%, Attack Power: +30, Critical Rate: 15%, Critical Damage: +10%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Rate and %Crit Damage

primary.name: Advanced Final Attack
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +30 permanently.\n[Final Attack Skills] Final Attack Chance: 75%, Damage: 95%, Times Activated: 4.
details: Increases activation chance and %Damage
Now grants flat Attack

primary.name: Four-Point Assault
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 32, Damage: 210%, Max Enemies Hit: 2, Number of Attacks: 11, Shadow Attack and Blind Chance: 20%, Enemy's Accuracy: -30% for 10 sec, Critical Hit on final attack
primary.desc: Creates multiple swords that strike forward and has a chance to debuff enemies
details: [Debuff]: Blind enemies, decreasing %Accuracy
Hits only 2 enemies
The last attack is always a guaranteed critical hit

primary.name: Radiant Cross
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Damage: 440%, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Number of Attacks: 4, Shadow Attack and Blind Chance: 30%, Enemy's Accuracy: -30% for 10 sec.
primary.desc: Slashes in front of you creating a blast of energy that has a chance to debuff enemies
details: [Debuff]: Blind enemies, decreasing %Accuracy

primary.name: Roiling Soul
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Final Damage: +30%, Critical Damage: +8%\nReduces the Max Enemies Hit for all skills (except some summons) by 1/3. For skills that target multiple enemies, Max Enemies Hit won't be reduced below 2.
primary.desc: While toggled, increases %Final Damage and %Crit Damage but reduces max enemies hit for all skills (except some summons)

primary.name: Combat Mastery
primary.shortDesc: 40% enemy DEF ignored

primary.name: Power Stance
primary.shortDesc: Knockback Resistance: +100%

primary.name: Call of Cygnus
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec
details: To obtain Call of Cygnus, you need to complete the quest 'The Alliance Gathers' at Lv. 120 from Neinheart in Ereve

hyperPassive.name: Enduring Spirit - Preparation
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Additional Abnormal Status Resistance: +10, Elemental Resistance: +10%

hyperPassive.name: Radiant Cross - Spread
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Damage: 75%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 4, Duration: 12 sec\nWhen Shadow Attack and Blind effect activates at 100% chance, Enemy's Accuracy: -30% for 10 sec, Duration is cut in half against bosses.
hyperPassive.desc: Leaves a lingering attack that damages enemies
details: Also applies debuff
To activate, press the Down Arrow Key and together
You can right-click the skill to trigger the additional attack each attack

hyperActive.name: Sacred Cube
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Duration: 30 sec, Damage: +10%, Max HP: +20%\nDamage Taken: -20%, Royal Guard defense possible for an additional 0.5 sec.\nCooldown: 210 sec

hyperActive.name: Charging Light
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Number of Enemies: 15, Damage: 600%, Number of Attacks: 10, 10% more damage for party members including yourself for 10 sec.\nCooldown: 15 sec
hyperActive.desc: Summons a knight to charge forward, damaging enemies
details: Grants a %Damage buff for you and your party members when skill is used

hyperActive.name: Queen of Tomorrow
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Cygnus class or Mihile in the party

fifthMain.name: Shield of Light
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 40 sec, Damage Reduction (to you and party member inside shield): 86% (including Percentage HP attacks).
Cannot use movement skills while utilizing shield.The shield has 3 layers, each of which can defend against 16, 16, and 21 attacks, respectively.
When the shield is gone, your Final Damage: +5% + 1% per defense count for 150 sec.
Press the skill key again to manually remove the shield.
Cooldown: 300 Sec.
fifthMain.desc: Creates a shield that blocks a large portion of damage taken by your party members (including %Max HP attacks)
details:
Up to a fixed amount of attacks can be blocked by the shield before it is destroyed
  • When your shield is gone, you gain a %Final Damage buff based on how many block charges remain
  • You can press the Skill Key again to manually remove the shield
You cannot use movement skills (like ) while shield is active

fifthMain.name: Sword of Light
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 800, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Number of Attacks: 7
Damage increases according to the number of Royal Guard's Attack Power buff's stack.
Royal Guard's Attack Power buff duration increases 6 sec after use. However, it cannot exceed the max value.
[0, 1 Stack] - Damage: 700%, [2 Stacks] - Damage: 820%, [3 Stacks] - Damage: 1010%[4 Stacks] - Damage: 1200%, [5 Stacks] - Damage: 1400%
Cooldown: 12 sec
When you attack during a cooldown: [1] attack activated per 5 sec. This attack is activated 5 sec after using the skill and does not increase the Buff Duration of Royal Guard.
100% chance to Blind enemies for 10 sec, reducing their Accuracy by 30%, Duration halved against bosses
fifthMain.desc: Creates a giant sword above you that shines, damaging and debuffing nearby enemies
details:
[Debuff]: Blinds enemies, reducing %Accuracy
  • Duration is halved for bosses
The size and damage of the attack becomes stronger based on how stacks of you have
Additionally, when you use Sword of Light, the duration of buff is increased but cannot exceed the max duration

While the Skill is on cooldown, periodically when you attack, you create an additional attack that damages nearby enemies
  • Attack has a chance to blind enemies
  • Attack does not increase duration of

fifthMain.name: Radiant Soul
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200
Equip the Radiant Soul for 30 sec for an increase on the following: Attack: +27%, Critical Rate: +100%, Ignore Defense: +100%. Royal Guard defense possible for an additional 0.5 sec.
Radiant Soul Slash: MP Cost: 100, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1300%, Number of Attacks: 7
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, pressing the Attack Key again performs a slash attack in front of you
details: Additionally while active, you gain increased %Attack, %Ignore DEF, 100% Crit Rate and increased activation period of by 0.5 secs

fifthMain.name: Light of Courage
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 25 sec, Damage: +22%.
Ignites a light that periodically attacks up to 4 surrounding enemies, for 650% damage, 5 time(s). Leaves the Light of Courage debuff on enemies successfully hit, and can be stacked up to 6 time(s). Debuff can only exist on up to 15 enemies at a time.
Light of Courage: Activates additional hits that deal 350% damage 2 time(s). Upon ending the skill, a Column of Light appears, attacking 10 time(s) for 750% damage (the number goes up proportionately to the number of Light of Courage stacks).
Party Effect: Forms a protective shield that corresponds to 260% of your and each of the party member's max HP. Protective Shield Duration: 10 sec, 7% of maximum reduced every sec.
Cooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: Increases %Damage and periodically damages and debuffs nearby enemies
details:
[Debuff]: Mihile's attacks deal an additional attack to the target
  • Stacks up to 6 times
  • At the end of the skill, based on how many stacks are on the damaged target, 'Column of Light' will appear that damages debuffed enemy
  • Up to 15 enemies can have the debuff at a time
[Party Effect]: Creates a slowly decaying damage shield based on their %Max HP

Can be cancelled by pressing the Skill Key again
  • Can be cancelled at the same time while using , , , or to remove the animation delay
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

meta: Mihile is a STR warrior class part of the Cygnus Knights. What makes Mihile unique is their special ability to parry enemy attacks to create a powerful damaging shockwave that also grants a powerful attack buff
